theme.title: Appearance
theme.subtitle: Choose your style or customize the theme
theme.systemDesc: Automatically switch according to system settings
theme.accentColorDesc: Select the main color of the app, affecting buttons, selected states, and other elements

keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.subtitle: Customize keyboard shortcuts to improve efficiency
keyboard.defaultShortcutsDesc: These are the app's default shortcuts, which cannot be changed
keyboard.customShortcutsDesc: Click on a shortcut to customize it
keyboard.editInstructions: Clear first, then press the key combination you want to use (press one key first then release, then press another key to create a combination)
keyboard.noteMessage: Settings will take effect on next launch.
keyboard.toggleAppDesc: Show or hide the application window
keyboard.moveUpDesc: Move selection to the previous item
keyboard.moveDownDesc: Move selection to the next item

sclip.title: SClip Settings
sclip.subtitle: Customize SClip's behavior and appearance
sclip.customizeContentDisplay: Customize how your clipboard content is displayed
sclip.customizeBehavior: Customize the operational logic of the application
sclip.jumpToFirstPage: Return to home page when showing main window

image.displayModeDesc: Choose how to display images in cards
image.autoSelectDesc: Automatically select the best display method based on image ratio, balancing aesthetics and clarity
image.fullDisplayDesc: Ensure images are displayed completely, may leave blank space, convenient for quickly locating needed content
image.cropFillDesc: Fill the area, may crop part of the image content, maintains image clarity
image.saveSuccess: Image display mode settings have been successfully applied, effective after reopening the app

animation.title: Image Micro-Animation
animation.subtitle: Add subtle dynamic effects to images
animation.enableAnimationDesc: Add slight dynamic effects to image cards to enhance visual experience
animation.saveSuccess: Image animation settings have been successfully applied, effective after reopening the app

wakeup.title: Return to Home on Wakeup
wakeup.subtitle: Customize page behavior when app wakes up
wakeup.jumpToFirstPageDesc: Automatically return to the first page each time the app wakes up
wakeup.saveSuccess: Return to home settings have been successfully applied, already effective

history.title: History Limit
history.subtitle: Set the number of history records to load when the app starts
history.recordCountDesc: Set the number of history records to load when the app starts
history.memoryUsage: Current history settings use approximately {memory}MB of memory
history.validPositiveNumber: Please enter a valid positive integer
history.minValue: Please enter a positive integer greater than 10
history.saveSuccess: History limit settings have been successfully applied, effective after restart

fixedWindow.title: Fixed Window
fixedWindow.subtitle: Set whether the main window is fixed on the screen
fixedWindow.toggleDesc: When enabled, the main window will be fixed on the screen and won't auto-hide
fixedWindow.saveSuccess: Fixed window settings have been successfully applied

indicator.title: Content Indicators & Tips
indicator.subtitle: Customize how content indicators and tips are displayed
indicator.typeIndicatorDesc: Show type icon in the bottom right corner to help quickly identify content type
indicator.longContentTipDesc: Show indicator when content exceeds display area
indicator.sampleText: This is a sample text content to demonstrate indicator and tip effects
indicator.previewDesc: Real-time preview of indicator and tip display effects
indicator.tipMessage: Max indicates content length exceeds display area, Doc indicates document type (Word, Excel, PPT, etc.), txt indicates text type
indicator.saveSuccess: Display settings have been successfully applied, effective after restart

textStyle.title: Text Style
textStyle.subtitle: Customize text content display in clipboard
textStyle.enableDesc: When enabled, copied text will retain original formatting such as bold, italic, colors, etc.
textStyle.compareDesc: Left shows plain text effect, right shows text style effect
textStyle.longTextLimitDesc: Set maximum character count for text display. Content exceeding this limit will be truncated with "..." button
textStyle.validPositiveNumber: Please enter a valid positive integer
textStyle.minValue: Please enter a positive integer greater than 100
textStyle.rtfNoteMessage: RTF format usually comes from content copied from Word, Excel and other Office applications. Adjusting RTF zoom can optimize the display of such rich text, making it easier to read.
textStyle.noteMessage: With text style enabled, text copied from Word, web pages and other applications will retain original formatting. When disabled, all text will be displayed as plain text.
textStyle.saveSuccess: Text style settings have been successfully applied, effective after restart

deduplication.title: Data Deduplication
deduplication.subtitle: Ensure no duplicates in the first 20 items of the copy list
deduplication.saveSuccess: Data deduplication settings have been successfully applied, effective after next use
deduplication.enableDesc: When enabled, the first 20 items in the copy list will not have duplicates

log.title: Logs
log.subtitle: Showing only warning and error level logs

fun.title: Fun Features
fun.subtitle: Customize special features and appearance of the app
fun.macStatusBarDesc: Use Mac style window control buttons on Windows
fun.restartRequired: Switch window control buttons from Windows style to Mac style, effective after restarting the app
fun.macSystemNote: You are using a Mac system, no need to set Mac style title bar.
fun.saveSuccess: Title bar style settings have been successfully applied, effective immediately

quote.content: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quote.author: Lao Tzu
